text.section:
This section applies to each individual subject to § 2-302 of this subtitle and to:
each spouse, dependent child, parent, brother, or sister of each commissioner, the People's Counsel, the General Counsel, and a hearing examiner; and
each spouse or dependent child of each other officer or employee of the Commission or Office of People's Counsel.

section.section: An individual subject to this section may not accept from a public service company or its officers, agents, or employees, a gift, gratuity, or special consideration.
This subsection does not preclude an individual from accepting a gift from a relative.
